translations: （特定地区的）居民，栖息者，动植物；常客；<英，史>（移居某国的）外籍居民；外来语

sentences.sentence: Long before Western science became enthralled with this nocturnal denizen of Madagascar's jungles, the aye-aye had its own reputation with the local people.
sentences.translation: 早在西方科学界对马达加斯加丛林中的这种夜行动物着迷之前，这种栗鼠猴就已经在当地人心中小有名气。

sentences.sentence: We fully intend to move forward on the development of our newest brand, Denizen Hotels.
sentences.translation: 我们打算完全向新的品牌D迈进。

sentences.sentence: Samples from the dead whale (pdf) will ultimately tell what killed this denizen of the deep.
sentences.translation: 从死鲸的例子将预知最终死亡深层的外来语。
